panels.content:
(your name) - UCS Traffic Monitoring - Location

Global or location specific monitoring of the Cisco UCS infrastructure

targets.query: select count(distinct(last)) from (SELECT last("serial") FROM "autogen"."BladeServers" WHERE ("location" = 'US') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY service_profile,domain,chassis,blade)
select count(distinct(last)) from (SELECT last("serial") FROM "autogen"."BladeServers" WHERE ("location" = 'China') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY service_profile,domain,chassis,blade)
select count(distinct(last)) from (SELECT last("serial") FROM "autogen"."BladeServers" WHERE ("location" = 'Italy') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY service_profile,domain,chassis,blade)
select count(distinct(last)) from (SELECT last("serial") FROM "autogen"."BladeServers" WHERE ("location" = 'UK') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY service_profile,domain,chassis,blade)

select sum(count) from (select count(distinct(chassis)) from (SELECT last("model") FROM "autogen"."BladeServers" WHERE ("location" = 'US') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY service_profile,domain,chassis,blade) group by domain)

select sum(count) from (select count(distinct(chassis)) from (SELECT last("model") FROM "autogen"."BladeServers" WHERE ("location" = 'UK') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY service_profile,domain,chassis,blade) group by domain)

select sum(count) from (select count(distinct(chassis)) from (SELECT last("model") FROM "autogen"."BladeServers" WHERE ("location" = 'Italy') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY service_profile,domain,chassis,blade) group by domain)

select sum(count) from (select count(distinct(chassis)) from (SELECT last("model") FROM "autogen"."BladeServers" WHERE ("location" = 'China') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY service_profile,domain,chassis,blade) group by domain)
select count(distinct(domain)) from (select domain,"name" from FIEnvStats WHERE ("location" = 'US') AND $timeFilter )
select count(distinct(domain)) from (select domain,"name" from FIEnvStats WHERE ("location" = 'UK') AND $timeFilter )
select count(distinct(domain)) from (select domain,"name" from FIEnvStats WHERE ("location" = 'China') AND $timeFilter )
select count(distinct(domain)) from (select domain,"name" from FIEnvStats WHERE ("location" = 'Italy') AND $timeFilter )
select count(last) from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "autogen"."FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "channel" != '') and $timeFilter group by domain,fi_id,port)

select count(last) AS "UP" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "autogen"."FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "oper_state" = 'up') and $timeFilter group by domain,fi_id,port)

select count(last) AS "Not UP" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "autogen"."FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "oper_state" != 'up') and $timeFilter group by domain,fi_id,port)

select count(last) AS "1 Gbps" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "autogen"."FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "oper_speed" = 1) and $timeFilter group by domain,fi_id,port)

select count(last) AS "10 Gbps" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "autogen"."FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "oper_speed" = 10) and $timeFilter group by domain,fi_id,port)

select count(last) AS "40 Gbps" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "autogen"."FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "oper_speed" = 40) and $timeFilter group by domain,fi_id,port)

select count(last) AS "FC" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "autogen"."FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "transport" = 'FC') and $timeFilter group by domain,fi_id,port)

select count(last) AS "Ethernet" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "autogen"."FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "transport" = 'Eth') and $timeFilter group by domain,fi_id,port)

select count(last) AS "4G" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "autogen"."FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "oper_speed" = 4) and $timeFilter group by domain,fi_id,port)

select count(last) AS "8G" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "autogen"."FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "oper_speed" = 8) and $timeFilter group by domain,fi_id,port)

select count(last) AS "16G" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "autogen"."FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "oper_speed" = 16) and $timeFilter group by domain,fi_id,port)
SHOW TAG VALUES CARDINALITY FROM "autogen"."FIEnvStats" WITH KEY=domain  WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/)

select count(service_profile) AS "OK" from (SELECT last("model") FROM "autogen"."BladeServers" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "oper_state" = 'ok') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY service_profile,domain,chassis,blade)

select count(service_profile) AS "Other" from (SELECT last("model") FROM "autogen"."BladeServers" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "oper_state" != 'ok') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY service_profile,domain,chassis,blade)
select sum(last) from (SELECT last("num_vFCs") FROM "autogen"."BladeServers" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY service_profile,domain,chassis,blade)
select count(last) from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "autogen"."FIServerPortStats" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "channel" != '') and $timeFilter group by domain,fi_id,port)

select sum(count) from (select count(distinct(chassis)) from (SELECT last("model") FROM "autogen"."BladeServers" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY service_profile,domain,chassis,blade) group by domain)
select sum(last) from (SELECT last("num_vEths") FROM "autogen"."BladeServers" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY service_profile,domain,chassis,blade)

select count(last) AS "UP" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "autogen"."FIServerPortStats" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "oper_state" = 'up') and $timeFilter group by domain,fi_id,port)

select count(last) AS "Not UP" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "autogen"."FIServerPortStats" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "oper_state" != 'up') and $timeFilter group by domain,fi_id,port)

select count(last) AS "1 Gbps" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "autogen"."FIServerPortStats" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "oper_speed" = 1) and $timeFilter group by domain,fi_id,port)

select count(last) AS "10 Gbps" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "autogen"."FIServerPortStats" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "oper_speed" = 10) and $timeFilter group by domain,fi_id,port)

select count(last) AS "40 Gbps" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "autogen"."FIServerPortStats" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "oper_speed" = 40) and $timeFilter group by domain,fi_id,port)
select count(service_profile) from (SELECT last("model") FROM "autogen"."BladeServers" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY service_profile,domain,chassis,blade)
select sum(last) from (SELECT last("num_cpus") FROM "autogen"."BladeServers" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY service_profile,domain,chassis,blade)
select sum(last) from (SELECT last("num_cores") FROM "autogen"."BladeServers" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY service_profile,domain,chassis,blade)
select sum(last) from (SELECT last("memory") FROM "autogen"."BladeServers" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY service_profile,domain,chassis,blade)

SELECT location as "Location", domain as "Domain",  chassis as "Chassis ID", model as "Model", serial as "Serial", num_cpus as "# CPU", num_cores as "# Cores", memory as "Memory", operability as "Operability", oper_state as "Operational State", oper_state_code, num_vEths as "# vEth", num_vFCs as "# vFC" FROM "autogen"."BladeServers" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "service_profile" order by time desc limit 1

panels.description: Combined Ethernet TX/RX traffic across all UCS domains at $location location(s)

targets.query: SELECT sum("bytes_rx_delta")  *8/ [[polling_interval]] AS "RX Traffic" FROM "FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "transport" = 'Eth' AND "channel" != '') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m),transport fill(linear)

SELECT sum("bytes_tx_delta")  *8/ [[polling_interval]] AS "TX Traffic" FROM "FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "transport" = 'Eth' AND "channel" != '') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m),transport fill(linear)

panels.title: Ethernet Traffic - Total

panels.description: Combined FC TX/RX traffic across all UCS domains at $location location(s)

targets.query: SELECT sum("bytes_rx_delta")  *8/ [[polling_interval]] AS "RX Traffic" FROM "FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "transport" = 'FC' AND "channel" != '') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m),transport fill(linear)

SELECT sum("bytes_tx_delta")  *8/ [[polling_interval]] AS "TX Traffic" FROM "FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "transport" = 'FC' AND "channel" != '') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m),transport fill(linear)

panels.title: FC Traffic - Total

panels.description: **Use Case**: Most and least busy locations, AKA top-talker and bottom-talker locations **How to use**: Monitor the traffic pattern over time in the graph. Sort by clicking on the avg or current.

targets.query: SELECT sum("bytes_rx_delta") *8/[[polling_interval]] AS "RX Traffic" FROM "FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "transport" = 'Eth' AND "channel" != '') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m),transport,location fill(linear)

targets.query: SELECT sum("bytes_rx_delta") *8/[[polling_interval]] AS "RX Traffic" FROM "VnicStats" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "transport" = 'Eth') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m),transport,domain,chassis,service_profile fill(linear)

targets.query: SELECT sum("bytes_rx_delta") *8/[[polling_interval]] AS "RX Traffic" FROM "VnicStats" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "transport" = 'FC') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m),transport,domain,chassis,service_profile fill(linear)

SELECT sum("mean") AS "RX Traffic" from (SELECT mean("bytes_rx_delta") *8/[[polling_interval]] FROM "VnicStats" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "transport" = 'FC') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),domain,chassis,service_profile,vif_name fill(linear)) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),transport,domain,chassis,service_profile  fill(linear)

panels.title: Top FC traffic - Ingress - per service profile breakdown

panels.title: Top FC traffic - Egress - per service profile breakdown

targets.query: SELECT sum("crc_rx_delta")  / [[polling_interval]] AS "RX CRC" FROM "FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "transport" = 'Eth' AND "channel" != '') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m),transport fill(linear)

SELECT sum("discard_rx_delta")  / [[polling_interval]] AS "RX Discards" FROM "FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "transport" = 'Eth' AND "channel" != '') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m),transport fill(linear)

SELECT sum("discard_tx_delta") / [[polling_interval]] AS "TX Discards" FROM "FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "transport" = 'Eth' AND "channel" != '') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m),transport fill(linear)

SELECT sum("crc_rx_delta")  / [[polling_interval]] AS "RX CRC" FROM "FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "transport" = 'FC' AND "channel" != '') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m),transport fill(linear)

SELECT sum("discard_rx_delta")  / [[polling_interval]] AS "RX Discards" FROM "FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "transport" = 'FC' AND "channel" != '') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m),transport fill(linear)

SELECT sum("discard_tx_delta")  / [[polling_interval]] AS "TX Discards" FROM "FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "transport" = 'FC' AND "channel" != '') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m),transport fill(linear)

SELECT sum("link_failures_delta")  / [[polling_interval]] AS "Link Failures" FROM "FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "transport" = 'FC' AND "channel" != '') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m),transport fill(linear)

SELECT sum("signal_losses_delta")  / [[polling_interval]] AS "Signal losses" FROM "FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "transport" = 'FC' AND "channel" != '') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m),transport fill(linear)

SELECT sum("sync_losses_delta")  / [[polling_interval]] AS "Sync losses" FROM "FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("location" =~ /^$location$/ AND "transport" = 'FC' AND "channel" != '') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m),transport fill(linear)

panels.description: **Use Case**: High-level indication of congestion at the selected location(s) **How to use**: Look for a sustained spike in PAUSE frame rate which is a an indication of congestion. This data is not conclusive due to averaging over a location. To find the exact point of congestion, continue digging further into location > Domain > Chassis > Service profile. **Details**: - The graph show PAUSE frame on FI server ports which are connected to IOM. - PAUSE frames are sent by a traffic receiver when it is unable to receive the traffic at the incoming rate. - Focus on (sustained) spikes only because PAUSE frames may be exchanged under normal condition also.

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(sum("pause_rx"),1s) AS "PAUSE against Inbound Traffic" FROM "FIServerPortStats" WHERE "location" =~ /^$location$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m),location fill(linear)

panels.title: PAUSE against inbound traffic (RX Pause) on server ports

panels.description: **Use Case**: High-level indication of congestion at the selected location **How to use**: Look for a sustained spike in PAUSE frame rate which is a an indication of congestion. This data is not conclusive due to averaging over a location. To find the exact point of congestion, continue digging further into location > Domain > Chassis > Service profile. **Details**: - The graph show PAUSE frame on FI server ports which are connected to IOM. - PAUSE frames are sent by a traffic receiver when it is unable to receive the traffic at the incoming rate. - Focus on (sustained) spikes only because PAUSE frames may be exchanged under normal condition also.

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(sum("pause_tx"),1s) AS "PAUSE" FROM "FIServerPortStats" WHERE "location" =~ /^$location$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m),location fill(linear)

panels.title: PAUSE against outbound traffic (TX Pause) on server ports

list.definition: show tag values from BladeServers with key=location
